title: Login Fails
body:
"Unable to connect to the Authentication service. Check the server status here. If it looks good follow the guide"

Anyone else getting this?

replies.body: We're currently having some [**slight login issues**](http://status.leagueoflegends.com/#na) and the devs are currently looking into it. I'd like to have you go ahead and reach out to our tech team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) with a trace route to see if anything might be blocking your connection to our servers. Use something like [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/winmtr-v0-92-now-available/) to run a trace to 192.64.170.1 and send those results over!
